page.title: Intel Doubles Dividend, Expands Buyback
page.text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Intel Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=INTC.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">INTC.O</A>, the world's largest maker of computer chips, said on Wednesday it would double its quarterly dividend to 8 cents a share, the second time this year it has doubled its cash payout.
